Introduction

Celest1a is an eight-member boy group under Birdman, produced by SUPER JUNIOR‘s Eunhyuk and ONE PACT‘s Jongwoo. They made their debut on July 31, 2024, with the single album "PANDA".

The meaning of their group name "Celest1a" is the concept of encouraging each member to showcase their individuality, embrace diversity, shine like stars, inspire dreams and hope in listeners, and strive to be the No. 1 and Only One.

The members are Akito, Seokhee, Daisuke, Seunghyun, Minwook, Junhyeok, Hayato, and Sejin.

The group was formed through their debut journey in the "K-POP HOUSE" reality show. The goal was to create a boy group active in different fields such as acting, MCing, singing, and modeling. Eunhyuk believes the members' ability to work in various fields will be more important than their idol ability.

On March 28, 2024, it was announced that Seunghyun would be taking a break from activities with Celest1a due to sudden hearing loss.

On November 1, it was announced on the group's official social media accounts that Celest1a had disbanded. All members posted their farewell letters the same day
